Interests

When forced indoors, I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world, reading technical documentation and watching a video about programming. Also I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows.

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I like to spend time in sports. During the warmer months here in Minsk, I enjoy biking on the streets or around lake, running around the stadium and doing exercises on the street workout ground. In the winter, I am working out in the gym.
